modName: Grantis Nord Heavy Two hander character
descriptionHtml:
In this save i have a character called Grantis, he is a Nordic 2H heavy armored character and is up to the high Hrothgar quest line part. I have joined the companions, have not fully completed but i have got the quests up to becoming a werewolf. 
I have only mainly leveled 2H and Heavy armour with some perks in there.

He is a lvl 6.

If you would like me to build you some more characters and get them to 
High Hrothgar i will only after say 10 endorse Thanks
author: Grantis
